import pandas as pd
import pyspark.pandas as ps
import json
import numpy as np
from datetime import datetime
import calendar
import warnings

import pyspark.sql.functions as F
import pyspark.sql.types as T

def pre_process_subscriptions(subscriptions_df):
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.select('SubscriptionId', 'OperationalWBS', 'Application')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.withColumnRenamed('SubscriptionId', 'SubId')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.withColumnRenamed('OperationalWBS', 'SubscriptionWBS')
    subscriptions_df = subscriptions_df.withColumnRenamed('Application', 'SubscriptionServiceNow-App')
    return subscriptions_df

def write_output_file(cost_df, destinationFilename):

    cost_df = cost_df.drop('id', 'AdditionalInfo') 
    print('start to write to container')
    cost_df.write.format('parquet').mode('overwrite').option('path', destinationFilename).save()
    print('File write complete!')

print(f'fromDate: {fromDate}')
print(f'toDate: {toDate}')

print(f"------ From: {fromDate}, To: {toDate} -----------")

print(f"------ {reportType} -----------")
date_range = fromDate + '-' + toDate
print(f'dateRange: {date_range}')

cost_source_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/daily/ACMDaily{reportType}/{date_range}/*.csv'
cost_target_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/exports/monthly/ACMMonthly{reportType}/{date_range}/Extended_v3_ACMMonthly{reportType}_{date_range}.parquet'
print(f"Cost data path: {cost_source_path}")
print(f"Cost destination path: {cost_target_path}")

previous_month_date = get_last_day_prev_month(toDate)
print(f'Using {previous_month_date} ServiceNow subscription file')
subscription_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/subscriptions/servicenow/{previous_month_date}-optimized.parquet'
print(f"Subscription path: {subscription_path}")

application_path = f'abfss://{container}@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/applications/ServiceNow-Application-List-Extended.parquet'
print(f"Application path: {application_path}")

# Load cost file
cost_csv_options = {'header' : True,
                'delimiter' : ',',
                'quote' : '"',
                'escape' : '"'}
cost_df = spark.read.options(**cost_csv_options).csv(cost_source_path)

# Load service file
service_path = f'abfss://usage@{storageAccount}.dfs.core.windows.net/services/services-raw.csv'
service_csv_options = {'header' : True,
                'delimiter' : ';',
                'quote' : '"',
                'escape' : '"'}
service_df = spark.read.options(**service_csv_options).csv(service_path)

# Load subscription file
subscription_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(subscription_path)
subscription_df = pre_process_subscriptions(subscription_df)

# Load application file
application_df = spark.read.format('parquet').load(application_path)
application_df = application_df.withColumn('AppID', F.col('AppID').cast("int"))

# Transform data
cost_df = transform_cost_data(cost_df)
cost_df = combine_subscriptions_and_applications(cost_df, subscription_df, application_df)
cost_df = add_azure_service_information(cost_df, service_df)
write_output_file(cost_df, cost_target_path)

print(' ')
